trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for controls that reside in <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> zones and are used to edit <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 用作位于 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> 区域中的控件的基类，用于编辑 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class provides a base set of properties and methods that are used by the derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and by custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>类提供一组基本的属性和所用的方法由派生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>提供 Web 部件控件集，以及自定义控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control allows a user to edit an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control by modifying its layout, appearance, properties, behavior, or other characteristics.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件允许用户编辑关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>通过修改其布局、 外观、 属性、 行为或其他特征的控件。

trans-unit.source: The editing user interface (UI), which consists of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zones that contain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, is displayed after a Web page enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 编辑的用户界面 (UI)，其中包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>区域包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制，网页进入编辑模式后，将显示。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control can be used only within a zone that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> class, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件可以使用仅在派生自的区域中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>类，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>控件。

trans-unit.source: After a page has entered edit mode, a user can select a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to edit by clicking an edit verb on the verbs menu of the selected control.
trans-unit.target: 页已进入编辑模式后，用户可以选择<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制可通过单击所选控件的谓词菜单上的编辑谓词来编辑。

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can be edited at a time.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>可以一次编辑控件。

trans-unit.source: Several derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, as listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 几个派生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件形式提供，如 Web 部件控件集，使用下表中列出。

trans-unit.source: These controls provide all the editing capabilities that are necessary for most applications.
trans-unit.target: 这些控件提供所需的大多数应用程序的所有编辑功能。

trans-unit.source: The typical approach for using these controls in a Web Parts page is to declare them in page persistence format within a `<zonetemplate>` element, where `<zonetemplate>` is the child element of an `<asp:editorzone>` element.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 部件页中使用这些控件的典型方法是以将它们声明中的页持久性格式`<zonetemplate>`元素，其中`<zonetemplate>`是的子元素`<asp:editorzone>`元素。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the Example section of this topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅本主题的示例部分。

trans-unit.source: Type of control
trans-unit.target: 控件类型

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Edits the appearance of the associated control, including properties such as its title text, height, width, and border attributes.
trans-unit.target: 编辑关联的控件，包括属性，例如其标题文本、 高度、 宽度和边框特性的外观。

trans-unit.source: Edits certain behaviors of the associated control, such as whether it can be edited, whether it can be closed, or whether it can be moved to another zone.
trans-unit.target: 编辑关联的控件，如是否可以编辑、 是否可以关闭它，或是否可以移动到另一区域的某些行为。

trans-unit.source: This control is only visible on a page when a control is being edited in shared personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: 控件在共享个性化设置作用域中进行编辑时，此控件才页上可见。

trans-unit.source: Edits layout attributes for the associated control, such as whether it is in a normal or minimized (collapsed) state, and what zone it is placed in.
trans-unit.target: 关联的控件，如是否处于正常或最小化 （折叠） 状态，以及哪个区域的编辑布局属性放入。

trans-unit.source: Edits properties of the associated control, if those properties were declared in the source code with a `WebBrowsable` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 编辑属性关联的控件中，如果使用的源代码中声明这些属性，因此`WebBrowsable`属性。

trans-unit.source: To improve accessibility, all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls provided in the Web Parts control set are rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: 若要提高可访问性，所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制提供在 Web 部件控件集都呈现在`<fieldset>`元素。

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in a given <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: `<fieldset>`元素进行分组的相关中用于编辑的控件集给定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制，以及它可以简化这些控件之间的选项卡式的导航，可视用户代理 （如普通 Web 浏览器） 和面向语音的用户代理（如屏幕阅读软件）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: This code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例包含四个部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 一个用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: A Web page that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control, with several of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls from the Web Parts control set declared in the zone, and a reference to a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 网页包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>具有多个控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>来自在该区域，以及对自定义的引用中设置声明的 Web 部件控件的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: A class that contains the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control for editing a property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含自定义类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制和自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件以供编辑中的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的工作原理时加载浏览器中说明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例的第一部分是使用户能够更改在网页上的显示模式的用户控件。

trans-unit.source: For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第二部分是网页。

trans-unit.source: It contains a declarative reference to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control, with a child `<zonetemplate>` element that contains declarative references to two of the Web Parts control set <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 它包含的声明性引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>具有子控件`<zonetemplate>`包含对两个 Web 部件控件集的声明性引用的元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The page also references a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, using a `Register` directive for the assembly, and the `<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>` element for the control.
trans-unit.target: 该页还引用自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，并使用`Register`程序集指令和`<aspSample:TextDisplayWebPart>`该控件的元素。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class named `TextDisplayWebPart`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第三部分是一个自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>类名为`TextDisplayWebPart`。

trans-unit.source: The class implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类应实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable>接口。

trans-unit.source: Within this class is a nested, private class that contains the code for a private <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class associated with the `TextDisplayWebPart` class and named `TextDisplayEditorPart`.
trans-unit.target: 在此类是一个嵌套的专用类为私有包含的代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>与关联的类`TextDisplayWebPart`类和名为`TextDisplayEditorPart`。

trans-unit.source: At run time, as the `TextDisplayWebPart` control enters edit mode, in its `TextDisplayWebPart.CreateEditorParts` method, it creates an instance of the `TextDisplayEditorPart` class, and displays it in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control, along with the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，作为`TextDisplayWebPart`控件进入编辑模式，在其`TextDisplayWebPart.CreateEditorParts`方法，它创建的一个实例`TextDisplayEditorPart`类，并将其显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>控件，以及其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: Load the page in a browser, and on the **Display Mode** control, select **Edit Mode** to switch to edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 加载页在浏览器中，和上**显示模式**控件中，选择**编辑模式**以切换到编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: Click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control.
trans-unit.target: 单击标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。

trans-unit.source: When the editing UI is visible, you can see three <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, including the custom one that enables you to edit the `TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle` property.
trans-unit.target: 编辑 UI 可见时，你可以看到三个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件，包括使你可以编辑的自定义一个`TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle`属性。

trans-unit.source: If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果在编辑 UI 和单击进行某些更改时**应用**按钮，你可以使用下拉列表控件返回页后，可以浏览模式，然后查看编辑更改的完整效果。

trans-unit.source: To create a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control, you must override two important methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建自定义<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" />控件，你必须重写两个重要的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges" /> method applies changes made in the editor control to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control being edited.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges" />方法将应用到编辑器控件中所做的更改<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />控制正在编辑。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges" /> method gets the current values of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control being edited, so that the editor control can edit them.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges" />方法获取的当前值<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />控制正在编辑，以便编辑器控件可以对其进行编辑。

trans-unit.source: Using these two critical methods, you get and set values between your custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control and the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control it is editing.
trans-unit.target: 使用这两种关键方法，你获取，并将值设置您的自定义之间<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" />控件和<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />正在编辑的控件。

trans-unit.source: If you derive from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> class to create custom editor controls, you can add your custom controls to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> zone by implementing the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable" /> interface in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control, a user control, or a server control.
trans-unit.target: 如果派生自<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" />类来创建自定义编辑器控件，你可以添加到你自定义控件<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" />通过实现区域<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable" />接口中<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />控件、 一个用户控件或服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: For more details and a code example, see the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable" /> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多详细信息和代码示例，请参阅<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable" />类概述。

trans-unit.source: Also, the code example in the Example section demonstrates how to implement <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable" /> in a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 此外，示例部分中的代码示例演示如何实现<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable" />在自定义<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />控件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化该类供继承的类实例使用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be called only by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数只能由继承的类调用。

trans-unit.source: Saves the values in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> 控件中的值保存到关联 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件的相应属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the action of saving values from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果将值从 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> 控件保存到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件的操作成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则（如果出现错误）为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method is a critical method on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>方法是在上一个关键方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: It is defined as an abstract method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and must be implemented by inherited controls.
trans-unit.target: 它将定义为在一个抽象方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>类，并由继承的控件必须实现。

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has entered into an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that is referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 方法的目的是以保存用户已输入到值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件中的对应属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>中引用的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>用户单击按钮表示为确定或编辑的用户界面 (UI) 中的应用谓词时调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>在自定义的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example demonstrates the implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method in the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class named `TextDisplayEditorPart`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第一部分演示如何实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>在自定义的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>类名为`TextDisplayEditorPart`。

trans-unit.source: This method gets a reference to the associated `TextDisplayWebPart` control using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法获取对关联的引用`TextDisplayWebPart`控制使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It then updates the value of the `TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle` property.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它更新的值`TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle`属性。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example shows how the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, creates a collection of associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls (in this case, there is only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control named `TextDisplayEditorPart` in the collection) in its implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第二部分显示如何关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件， `TextDisplayWebPart`，创建的集合关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件 (在这种情况下，都只有一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件名为`TextDisplayEditorPart`集合中) 中其实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is executed when the `TextDisplayWebPart` control enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 执行此方法时`TextDisplayWebPart`控件进入编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: A class that derives from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> class must implement the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的类<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" />类必须实现<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges" />方法。

trans-unit.source: The implemented method gets a reference to the associated control using the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit" /> property, and then updates the properties of that control with the current values in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 实现的方法获取对关联的控件使用的引用<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit" />属性，然后使用中的当前值更新该控件的属性和<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" />控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当某个控件的关联 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件在编辑模式下时是否应显示该控件。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指示是否应显示该控件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: At certain points in the editing process, the zone that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> property to determine whether to display the control.
trans-unit.target: 在中编辑中的某些点处理，包含的区域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制检查<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A>属性来确定是否显示控件。

trans-unit.source: There are two scenarios where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> property returns `false` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: 有两种方案其中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A>属性返回`false`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件不会显示。

trans-unit.source: The first scenario occurs when the control being edited is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 正在编辑的控件时，将发生第一个方案<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The second scenario occurs when the control being edited has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> properties set to `true`, while the page's personalization scope is set at user level.
trans-unit.target: 正在编辑的控件具有时发生第二个方案其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>属性设置为`true`，而在用户级别设置页的个性化设置范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that contains the title text displayed in the title bar of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字符串，该字符串包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> 控件的标题栏中显示的标题文本。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the complete, visible title of the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示控件的完整可见标题的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated, culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是一个由 .NET Framework 提供的、特定于区域性的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.DisplayTitle%2A> property returns either the current value of the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property or, if the control has no title, a calculated value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.DisplayTitle%2A>属性返回基的当前值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>属性或如果控件具有没有标题，计算得出的值。

trans-unit.source: The calculated value consists of a localizable resource string for untitled controls.
trans-unit.target: 计算的值包含无标题控件的可本地化的资源字符串。

trans-unit.source: In the cases where no value is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.DisplayTitle%2A> property differs from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在情况下，没有值分配给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>属性、 的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.DisplayTitle%2A>属性不同于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.DisplayTitle%2A> property is designed to be a read-only, calculated property to get the actual current value of the displayed title at run time, do not attempt to use this property to set a title for an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.DisplayTitle%2A>属性设计为只读的要在运行时，获取显示的标题的实际当前值的计算的属性不会尝试使用此属性设置的标题<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: To set a title, use the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置标题，请使用基<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current state of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control's parent zone.
trans-unit.target: 检索 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> 控件的父区域的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that has the current state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> zone that contains an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />，其中具有包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> 区域的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.GetDesignModeState%2A> method returns information about the state of the zone that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.GetDesignModeState%2A>方法返回有关包含的区域的状态信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The state information is returned in the form of a dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 在字典中的窗体中返回的状态信息。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: In addition to calling the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> method, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.OnPreRender%2A> method also checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 除了调用基<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>方法，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.OnPreRender%2A>方法还检查<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the value is `false`, meaning that the control should not be displayed, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property is also set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为`false`，这意味着，应该不会显示该控件，则<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>属性也设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that contains state data for displaying the zone.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />，包含用于显示区域的状态数据。

trans-unit.source: Applies the characteristics of the design-mode state to the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> zone that contains an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将设计模式状态的特性应用于包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> 控件的当前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> 区域。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control for its associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件检索其关联 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> 控件的属性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method is a critical method on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>方法是在上一个关键方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: It is defined as an abstract method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and must be implemented by inherited controls.
trans-unit.target: 它将定义为在一个抽象方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>类，并由继承的控件必须实现。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the method is to retrieve the current values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property, and update the fields in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: 该方法的目的是检索中的当前值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>中引用的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>属性，并更新中的字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>使用这些值，以便用户可以对其进行编辑的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>调用方法每当中关联的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件可能已更改。

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method immediately after calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 为每个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>包含控件调用区域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>方法后立即调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>方法，以便中的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件中的值始终保持同步关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: Another case where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method is called is when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is entering edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 另一种情况其中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>调用方法时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件进入编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method is not called after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method if that method returns `false`, because in that case, an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>不会调用方法后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>方法如果该方法返回`false`，因为在这种情况下，出现错误。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>在自定义的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example demonstrates the implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method in the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class named `TextDisplayEditorPart`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第一部分演示如何实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>在自定义的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>类名为`TextDisplayEditorPart`。

trans-unit.source: This method gets a reference to the associated `TextDisplayWebPart` control using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法获取对关联的引用`TextDisplayWebPart`控制使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It then gets the value of the `TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle` property, and updates which item is selected in the drop-down list control (referenced by the `TextDisplayEditorPart.PartContentFontStyle` property) on the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它获取的值`TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle`属性，并在下拉列表控件中选择哪一项的更新 (所引用的`TextDisplayEditorPart.PartContentFontStyle`属性) 自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example shows how the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, creates a collection of associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls (in this case, there is only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control named `TextDisplayEditorPart` in the collection) in its implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第二部分显示如何关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件， `TextDisplayWebPart`，创建的集合关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件 (在这种情况下，都只有一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件名为`TextDisplayEditorPart`集合中) 中其实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebEditable.CreateEditorParts%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is executed when the `TextDisplayWebPart` control enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 执行此方法时`TextDisplayWebPart`控件进入编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: A class that derives from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> class must implement the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的类<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" />类必须实现<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges" />方法。

trans-unit.source: The implemented method gets a reference to the associated control using the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit" /> property, and then updates the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control with the property values from the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 实现的方法获取对关联的控件使用的引用<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit" />属性，然后更新<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" />来自关联的属性值的控件<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control associated with the current Web page.
trans-unit.target: 获取对与当前网页关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件的引用。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> on the page.
trans-unit.target: 对网页上 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 的引用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control needs a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instance because it must check the current personalization scope of the page to determine the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件需要对引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>实例，因为必须检查页后，可以确定的值的当前个性化设置范围<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Personalization scope is determined by checking the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A> property, which is accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过检查来确定个性化设置范围<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>属性，可通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control that is currently being edited.
trans-unit.target: 获取对当前正在编辑的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件的引用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that is currently in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 当前处于编辑模式中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control (or other server or user control) that is currently being edited corresponds to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件 （或其他服务器或用户控件） 是当前正在编辑的值相对应<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can be edited at a time, and when a control is in edit mode, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property provides a reference to that control.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>可一次，以及当控件处于编辑模式，编辑控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>属性提供对该控件的引用。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone has added the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control to its collection of controls, it then assigns the value of its own <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.WebPartToEdit%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>区域已添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制到其集合中的控件，它将赋的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.WebPartToEdit%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property especially in its two critical methods--<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>--to get and set the property values on the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>属性尤其是在其两个关键方法--<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>-若要获取和设置关联控件的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> zone that contains an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> 区域的引用。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> that contains the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" />。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Zone%2A> property is read-only, it provides a reference to the zone object that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control, and you can programmatically change property values on the zone itself.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Zone%2A>属性是只读的它提供对包含的区域对象的引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件，并且可以以编程方式更改上的区域本身当中的属性值。
